item.description: This meditation group meets weekly on Sundays 5-6 p.m. (donation only) and is good for beginners as well as experienced meditators. Being guided will help you relax and let go. It's a nice community of people in a lovely setting in a healing space. Kriya meditation is based on the teachings of Yogananda.  It is a guided meditation meant to bring about a felt sense of divine love into your body, heart and mind.  Some time is also spent in silence. This practice is non-denominational, appropriate for anyone. Kriya practice involves bringing in to your body/mind the higher vibration of unconditional love and light. After we fill ourselves with light, we go into silence. It brings about a peace and an expansion of consciousness. We begin with quick introductions, and end with some sharing and Q&A.  All are welcome! See more at [url=http://www.ahigherbalance.com]www.ahigherbalance.com[/url]
item.how_to_find_us: Enter at The Hawthorne Building, the door between Saucy Insurance and H&R Block.

group.name: The Salem MA Meditation Meetup Group
